channel.title: Comments on: UK Night at Lotusphere – VENUE CHANGE

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Peter,</p><p>I think we can reach an accommodation, especially after the cricket last summer ;-)</p><p>Pop by stand 622 or catch me at BALD or the Sunday evening party and we'll sort you out.</p><p>See you next week.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Peter,

I think we can reach an accommodation, especially after the cricket last summer ðŸ˜‰

Pop by stand 622 or catch me at BALD or the Sunday evening party and we’ll sort you out.

See you next week.

Matt

item.title: By: Peter Presnell
item.dc:creator: Peter Presnell
item.description: <p>Hey Matt. I haven't seen any signs of an Aussie contingent planning a Barbie out on the Boardwalk so will you guys accept people who at least understand what it means to get a "thin snick through to the slips" or "a rip snorter of a yorker"? Cheers</p>
item.content:encoded: Hey Matt. I haven’t seen any signs of an Aussie contingent planning a Barbie out on the Boardwalk so will you guys accept people who at least understand what it means to get a "thin snick through to the slips" or "a rip snorter of a yorker"? Cheers
